text.simpleteleporters.how_to_link: Sneak right click a block to link a position
text.simpleteleporters.error.no_crystal: This teleporter doesn't have an Ender Shard!
text.simpleteleporters.error.unlinked_te: This teleporter's Ender Shard is unlinked!
text.simpleteleporters.error.invalid_pos: Teleport position is invalid! Perhaps there's a block in the way?
text.simpleteleporters.error.wrong_dimen: This teleporter's Ender Shard isn't powerful enough to cross dimensions!
